entry.title: Current Conditions: 23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
Temperature: 23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Humidex: 27
Dewpoint: 14.4°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 26. Humidex 31. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Risk of thundershowers early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
